patthana21.40:4.1: Naappaccayaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.40:4.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana21.40:5.1: Naappaccayaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.40:5.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana21.40:6.2: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
